reviews.review: emmm 入坑挺晚的，游戏体验还好，就是屠夫排不到人啊。
杀机这个游戏除去一些bug问题，可玩性很高，有很多不同的玩法给你选择。一开始是个恐怖游戏，后来变成竞技游戏，再后来你如果开黑还可以变成搞笑游戏，，总之强烈推荐。。另外，这个游戏萌新的门槛稍微高一点，不过也是无伤大雅
O jogo é bem bacana viciante o único ponto negativo que achei até agora foi que se quiser jogar de assassino demora muito para começar a partida... mas tirando isso super recomendo!

Honestly I don't play any video games, but for some reason the second I started to play DBD I just couldn't stop and three years later its just as fun as the first time I played it. Obviously every game has its flaws and so does DBD but the pros definitely overshadow the cons and that's why I recommend this game to everyone I know.

I highly recommend this game for anyone who wants to play a fun PvP game and who is okay with a bit of blood and screaming here and there.

Pros:
-Brilliant game design that allows for non-typical PvP matches
  -Killer side: 1st person, deliberate attacks (2 hits to down a survivor, high cooldown between strikes) and time management to prevent generator progress
  -Survivor side: 3rd person, many activities to do, often cooperatively with others, some requiring twitch reflexes and others requiring stealthiness and/or tactics; working together as a team is very helpful
  -In most cases, the survivor can anticipate when the killer is nearby and see where the killer is looking, which helps with juking and being stealthy, but the killer can also track scratch marks of running survivors, so care is needed in determining when to run or walk
-Many different killers to choose from, each with their own unique power
-Many perks to choose 4 from for your own unique build (killer and survivor sides), potentially significantly altering the way you play each trial
-New content (survivors, killers, maps, and cosmetics) gets released often
-Survivors can be hooked 3 times (assuming they got rescued the first 2 times) prior to them being sacrificed, so this allows for longer, more interesting gameplay coupled with possible comebacks (assuming the killer doesn't tunnel and camp you)
-Music, sound, and atmosphere are well done; I love the music that plays when a survivor and killer are in an active chase; it's also important for the killer to pay attention to many environmental, directional, audio queues to track survivors (like heavily breathing injured survivors, moving grass, rushed vaults, etc.)
-Gritty graphics style and interesting character designs are very suitable
-Progression system keeps the game interesting and competitive (survivor rank, killer rank, player level, character levels) and the trial scoring system is fun also (4 different emblems for survivor and 4 for killer for different categories of performance, each having 4 levels)

Cons:
-Apart from their skin/cosmetics, survivors are all the same in terms of functionality (perks, usable items, etc.)
-You may encounter performance issues on computers without dedicated graphics cards or computers with slower graphics cards, especially since after the latest graphics update of environments, props, animations, and HUD
